response.overview: Virginia is proud that she belongs to a clique. The best students at a private school. But before her 18th birthday, a gruesome set of murders take place and her friends are the ones who are falling prey. Could it be her? She suffers from blackouts due to a freak accident one year earlier. We soon learn the truth behind her accident and what is going on.
response.tagline: Six of the most bizarre murders you will ever see.
response.title: Happy Birthday to Me

results.name: Happy Birthday to Me (1981) ORIGINAL TRAILER
